dt-example.title: Don't save SearchPanes
dt-example.info: This example shows how to use the `-init stateRestore.searchPanes` initialisation option to disable the saving of the table's current `-init searchPanes` search criteria by setting the value of the initialisation option to `false`. The default value is `true` meaning that the searchPanes search criteria will be saved.
